content: last three stitches k2tog k1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 rounds 2-3 knit all stitches round 4 knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 rounds 5-6 knit all stitches round 7 knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 rounds 8-9 knit all stitches round 10 knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog knit 1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 round 11 knit all stitches repeat rounds 10-11 until the sock has 32 36 40 total stitches remaining 16 18 20 stitches on needle 1 and 2 now repeat the following row knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 repeat until the sock has 20 24 24 stitches remaining 10 12 12 stitches on needle 1 and 2 graft the toes closed with your desired method i love to use the finchley graft which you can find instructions for on youtube or below finchley graft instructions repeat entire process for second sock if you want a pair weave in the ends soak them in warm water with wool soap for 15-20 minutes gently press the water out of the socks and lay them flat to dry or use sock blockers if you have them enjoy your socks and if you have any questions please feel free to contact me on ravelry as skyskein
